700881f-a.folder: Gun Hill Road (East) & Perry Avenue, Bronx, NY
700881f-a.original_title: Bronx: Gun Hill Road (East) - Perry Avenue
700881f-a.text:
390 East Gun Hill Road, at the S.E. corner of Perry Avenue,
showing the Carmelite Sisters Chapel.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr,
(2)
The same looking toward Perry Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Another view of the chapel, looking up Perry Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
